name: Pinguin Project
description:
Pinguin project is a game made in Unity 5 in C#.

The game is not even an alpha version (no real levels, only a test playground) but you can find the developer builds here.

The main principle of the game is simple, you play one (or two) penguin(s) sliding on the ice and you have to reach the end of the levels. 
Special powers, puzzles and cooperation will be added in future updates.

You can take a look at the source code and the changelog here.
